paper.title: Engineering Software Architectures, Processes and Platforms for System Families - ESAPS Overview
paper.abstract: Between July 1999 and June 2001, 22 European companies and research institutes worked together in the ESAPS project to enhance their capabilities for engineering software for system families. This paper describes the main objectives of the project, and an overview of the results obtained in the project. Finally, the project is related to other projects and initiatives with similar goals.
